title: gpt3_engine_settings
notes: Specify all relevant parameters as shown on OpenAI's playground here
title: classification_task
notes: This will be either sentiment or arousal
title: train_mode

train_mode.notes: If 'train', it is advised to choose engine 'davinci-instruct-beta', in 'prompt_design' provide 'prompt' as first line of prompt, put 'prompt_type' as 'long', in 'zeroshot' provide 'descriptive_prompt' to further give the engine instruction on task and categories
If 'zeroshot', advised to choose engine davinci or 'cushman-alpha' (if available at time of use), in 'prompt_design' provide 'short' under 'prompt_type', provide 'descriptive_prompt' in 'zeroshot'

zeroshot.descriptive_prompt: Given a tweet, classify it into 4 arousal categories: High Activation, Medium Activation, Medium Deactivation or High Deactivation.

title: prompt_design

prompt_design.prompt: Given a tweet, classify it into 4 arousal categories: High Activation, Medium Activation, Medium Deactivation or High Deactivation.
